original: 譙郡銍人，歷仕曹魏、西晉，嵇康之兄。頗有統兵之能，曾抵禦東吳入侵和平定吳將叛變，《晉書》中稱其「有當世才」。
text: A native of Qiaojunquan, the elder brother of Ji Kang, who has served in Cao Wei and Western Jin Dynasty. He was quite capable of commanding troops. He had resisted the invasion of the Dongwu and pacified the rebellion of General Wu. In the Book of Jin, he was called "a talent in the world."
